isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS AND ACCESSORIES - Using Master Diagnostics (MD 32) - Snapshot- Record And Replay

svcsubproc.title: Recording a Snapshot
svcsubproc.para: To open an existing snapshot setup, select File from the drop-down menu, then Open. Select the (*.trg) extension in the Files of type box within the Open dialog box, then select the appropriate file from the various list.

svcsubproc.title: Replaying a Snapshot with Graphical Windows
svcsubproc.para: The replay feature will only playback recorded files created by Master Diagnostics software. The replay feature allows two different displays: graphical and text.
Select Snapshot then Replay and finally Graphical.

figure.caption: Replaying a Snapshot with Graphical Window

svcsubproc.para: The Open Snap Shot Recording File dialog box will appear. Click on a desired filename, then click Open. The Graphical Replay window opens. To modify this window for viewing data, see the Master Diagnostics (MD) Software User's Manual.

svcsubproc.title: Replaying a Snapshot with Text Windows
svcsubproc.para: Select SnapShot, from the drop down menu bar then Replay and finally Text.

figure.caption: Replaying a Snapshot with Text Window

svcsubproc.para: The Open Snap Shot Recording Filedialog box appears. Click on a filename to select it and then click Open. The Text Replay window opens.
